channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- CPG BIOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- CPG BIOS

item.title: CVE-2024-32859|2024-06-13T12:39:41.863Z -- dell -- cpg%20bios
item.description: Dell Client Platform BIOS contains an Improper Input Validation vulnerability in an externally developed component. A high privileged attacker with local access could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to Code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-32858|2024-06-13T12:48:29.724Z -- dell -- cpg%20bios
item.description: Dell Client Platform BIOS contains an Improper Input Validation vulnerability in an externally developed component. A high privileged attacker with local access could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to Code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-28970|2024-06-12T13:11:44.425Z -- dell -- cpg%20bios
item.description: Dell Client BIOS contains an Out-of-bounds Write vulnerability. A local authenticated malicious user with admin privileges could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to platform denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-0160|2024-06-12T13:19:06.076Z -- dell -- cpg%20bios
item.description: Dell Client Platform contains an incorrect authorization vulnerability. An attacker with physical access to the system could potentially exploit this vulnerability by bypassing BIOS authorization to modify settings in the BIOS.

item.title: CVE-2023-28063|2024-02-06T07:38:54.321Z -- dell -- cpg%20bios
item.description: Dell BIOS contains a Signed to Unsigned Conversion Error vulnerability. A local authenticated malicious user with admin privileges could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2023-48674|2024-06-04T17:27:37.432Z -- dell -- cpg%20bios
item.description: Dell Platform BIOS contains an Improper Null Termination vulnerability. A high privilege user with network access to the system could potentially send malicious data to the device in order to cause some services to cease to function.

item.title: CVE-2023-39251|2023-12-22T17:55:18.705Z -- dell -- cpg%20bios
item.description: Dell BIOS contains an Improper Input Validation vulnerability. A local malicious user with high privileges could potentially exploit this vulnerability in order to corrupt memory on the system.

item.title: CVE-2023-32475|2024-06-07T17:00:46.144Z -- dell -- cpg%20bios
item.description: Dell BIOS contains a missing support for integrity check vulnerability. An attacker with physical access to the system could potentially bypass security mechanisms to run arbitrary code on the system.

item.title: CVE-2023-43088|2023-12-22T18:00:38.953Z -- dell -- cpg%20bios
item.description: Dell Client BIOS contains a pre-boot direct memory access (DMA) vulnerability. An authenticated attacker with physical access to the system may potentially exploit this vulnerability in order to execute arbitrary code on the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-22448|2024-06-04T17:52:58.050Z -- dell -- cpg%20bios
item.description: Dell BIOS contains an Out-of-Bounds Write vulnerability. A local authenticated malicious user with admin privileges could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-22429|2024-06-06T14:03:23.200Z -- dell -- cpg%20bios
item.description: Dell BIOS contains an Improper Input Validation vulnerability. A local authenticated malicious user with admin privileges could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-0160|2024-06-12T06:41:33.041Z -- dell -- cpg%20bios
item.description: Dell Client Platform contains an incorrect authorization vulnerability. An attacker with physical access to the system could potentially exploit this vulnerability by bypassing BIOS authorization to modify settings in the BIOS.

item.title: CVE-2024-28970|2024-06-12T06:51:49.004Z -- dell -- cpg%20bios
item.description: Dell Client BIOS contains an Out-of-bounds Write vulnerability. A local authenticated malicious user with admin privileges could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to platform denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-32856|2024-06-13T11:51:03.183Z -- dell -- cpg%20bios
item.description: Dell Client Platform BIOS contains an Improper Input Validation vulnerability in an externally developed component. A high privileged attacker with local access could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to Information disclosure.
